title: UBCD V5.1 alpha 2 is now available for download

forumNotes.author: Icecube
forumNotes.content:
> **UBCD V5.1 alpha 2 is now available for download**  
>
> Torrent: [http://www.ultimateb...1a2.iso.torrent](http://www.ultimatebootcd.com/download/ubcd51a2.iso.torrent "External link")  
> Magnet URI: magnet:?xt=urn:btih:TDOZY6F5AWSDPRAPMO3BWROAXR64S5LF  
> md5sum: 566978e1c68f6442442784f5ff67fbd3  
> sha1sum: 6a85b03c0404b0345a6c7e9644afe9373234b955  
> SHA-256: 5C05D4908D6843CC7DE356A547C998C3D8B256BA7AD15CEDB59AFFB44949C720 (computed using 7-Zip's "Calculate checksum" function)  
>
> **Description:**  
>
> This is more a "work-in-progress" update to try to bring all the components up-to-date. The major change is that Avira Rescue CD has been removed. Since there are now many free antivirus rescue CDs available (see [SARDU](http://www.sarducd.it/antivirus.html "External link"), this is best left as a customization option. The default F-Prot and ClamAV modules in Parted Magic will suffice.  
>
> The two components which have not been updated are 1) cpustress, and 2) xfprot 2.4 / f-prot 6.0.3. I will have to work with IceCube on these in the next release, since I realize I don't have the technical know-how to do it myself. ![:ph34r:](http://reboot.pro/public/style_emoticons/default/scared9.gif)   
>
> Also, I am having some trouble uploading to the usual HTTP mirror (waiting to hear back from the mirror owner), so only torrent download is available now. Will update this post later when the HTTP mirror issue is settled.  
>
> **Changelog:**  
> - [Updated shsucdx.com in UBCD FreeDOS lib\\shsucdx.cab to V3.05. Thanks for ady for the update.](http://adoxa.110mb.com/shsucdx/index.html "External link")  
> - [Updated ubcd\\tools\\linux\\ubcd2usb\\readme.txt and added instructions to make created partition active. Thanks to timjwatts for the suggestion.](http://www.ultimatebootcd.com/forums/viewtopic.php?p=10228 "External link")  
> - [Added Video Memory Stress Test V1.7. Thanks to dthatcher for the suggestion.](http://www.ultimatebootcd.com/forums/viewtopic.php?p=10677 "External link")  
> - [Added wdidle3 V1.05.](http://www.ultimatebootcd.com/forums/viewtopic.php?p=9534 "External link")  
> - [Updated some help text.](http://www.ultimatebootcd.com/forums/viewtopic.php?p=9631 "External link")  
> - [Updated UBCD FreeDOS to V1.41. Introduced "nolbacache" parameter (in memdisk and config.sys) to launch without LBACACHE.](http://www.ultimatebootcd.com/forums/viewtopic.php?p=9685 "External link")  
> - [Corrected Kon-Boot version to V1.0](http://www.ultimatebootcd.com/forums/viewtopic.php?p=9831 "External link")  
> - Added HWiNFO V5.5.2. Thanks to ady for the update.  
> - Added Partinfo V1.11. Thanks to ady for the suggestion.  
> - Deprecated AVG Rescue CD, which is considered to be best left as a customization option.  
> - Deprecated AVIRA AntiVir Rescue System, which is considered to be best left as a customization option.  
> - Fixed launch parameters of stand-alone FDUBCD (fdubcd.iso.gz instead of fdubcd.img.gz).  
> - Fixed missing launch parameters.  
> - Reinclude manufacturer's name for HDD utils.  
> - Retained Memtest86 V3.5b that has certain features that are missing in the new Memtest86 V4.0. Thanks to ady for the update.  
> - Updated ASTRA to V5.48. Thanks to ady for the update.  
> - Updated DiskCheck to V3.9.2.  
> - Updated EaseUs Disk Copy to V2.3 with version from MajorGeeks (Mar 2010). Thanks to ady for sending me a PM about this. The launch method has been changed to memdisk.  
> - Updated ES-Tool to V3.01v. Thanks to ady for the update.  
> - Updated files from syslinux 4.0.3.  
> - Updated Gujin to V2.8.3. Thanks to ady for the update.  
> - Updated HDClone to V4.0.4c. Thanks for ady for the update.  
> - Updated Intel Processor Identification Utility to V4.30. Thanks to ady for the update.  
> - Updated MBRtool to V2.3.200. Thanks to ady for notifying me via PM.  
> - Updated MBRWork to V1.08. Thanks to ady who sent me a PM about this.  
> - Updated Memtest86 to V4.0. Thanks to ady for the update.  
> - Updated Memtest86+ to V4.20. Thanks to ady for the update.  
> - Updated Parted Magic to V5.10. Also updated pccmoscleaner-2.0.txz, pcdiskeraser-5.0.txz, pcloginnow-2.0.txz, pcregedit-2.0.txz from [http://beefdrapes.pa...ules/non-free/.](http://beefdrapes.partedmagic.com/modules/non-free/. "External link") Thanks to IceCube for the update.  
> - Updated Partition Saving to V3.90. Thanks to ady for the update.  
> - Updated PLoP Boot Manager to V5.0.11-2. Thanks to ady for the update.  
> - Updated SeaTools for DOS to V2.23. Thanks to ady for the update.  
> - Updated Super Grub2 Disk to V1.98s1. Thanks to ady for the update.
http://www.ultimatebootcd.com/forums/viewtopic.php?f=7\&t=3830
